alert.note: Alert for Edmonson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 9:50AM EST until February 16 at 12:30PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky including the following counties, Logan, Edmonson, and Warren. * WHEN...Until noon CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 848 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bowling Green, Russellville, Brownsville, Plum Springs, Memphis Junction, Crestmoor, Mount Victor, Auburn, Adairville and Smiths Grove. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
